languages.text: "Мне... Моему Дому более нечего предложить вам, {name}". {n}Кассия склоняет голову намного ниже, чем того позволяет достоинство Навис Нобилите.{/n} "Быть может, во Дворце Атласа сокрыта награда, превосходящая все ожидания. Быть может — лишь серый пепел разочарования. И все же мы с вами рука об руку прошли долгий путь. Я отдаюсь на вашу милость... В последний раз".

traits.locale_text: "Мне... Моему дому более нечего предложить вам, {name}". {n}Кассия склоняет голову намного ниже, чем того позволяет достоинство Навис Нобилите.{/n} "Быть может, во Дворце Атласа сокрыта награда, превосходящая все ожидания. Быть может — лишь серый пепел разочарования. И все же мы с вами рука об руку прошли долгий путь. Я отдаюсь на вашу милость... В последний раз".

languages.text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

Быть может — лишь серый пепел разочарования. И все же мы с вами рука об руку прошли долгий путь. Я отдаюсь на вашу милость... В последний раз".

languages.text: 「あたくしが…。オーセリオ家が差し出せるものはもうありません、{name}様」{n}カシアは頭を一段と深く下げる。威厳ある航宙貴族の、普通の一礼とは違う。{/n}「アトラスの宮殿には我々の期待を上回るものがあるかもしれません。絶望という灰色の燃えかすしか見つけられないかもしれません。ですが、我々は長い道を共に、寄り添って歩いてきたのです。最後は…あなたの寛大さに身を委ねます」
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしが…。オーセリオ家が差し出せるものはもうありません、{name}様」{n}カシアは頭を一段と深く下げる。威厳ある航宙貴族の、普通の一礼とは違う。{/n}「アトラスの宮殿には我々の期待を上回るものがあるかもしれません。絶望という灰色の燃えかすしか見つけられないかもしれません。ですが、我々は長い道を共に、寄り添って歩いてきたのです。最後は…あなたの寛大さに身を委ねます」

languages.text: “我……我的家族已经没有什么东西可以回报你了，{name}。”{n}卡西娅低下了头，比导航宗族惯常的鞠躬低很多。{/n}“或许圣仪宫殿神殿的发现会超出我们的预期，又或许那里只有令人失望的灰烬。然而，你我已经并肩走过了漫长的道路。因此，我在此乞求你的慷慨……这是最后一次。”
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: “我……我的家族已经没有什么东西可以回报你了，{name}。”{n}卡西娅低下了头，比导航宗族惯常的鞠躬低很多。{/n}“或许圣仪宫殿神殿的发现会超出我们的预期，又或许那里只有令人失望的灰烬。然而，你我已经并肩走过了漫长的道路。因此，我在此乞求你的慷慨……这是最后一次。”

languages.text: « Je... Ma maison n'a rien de plus à vous offrir, {name}. » {n}Cassia incline la tête bien plus bas que ne l'exige le protocole pour un membre de la Navis Nobilite.{/n} « Le palais de l'Atlas contiendra peut-être une récompense qui dépasse notre imagination la plus folle. Ou peut-être n'y trouverons-nous que les cendres grises de la déception... Pourtant, nous avons parcouru beaucoup de chemin ensemble, vous et moi. Je ne peux donc que faire appel à votre magnanimité... une dernière fois. »
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: « Je... Ma maison n'a rien de plus à vous offrir, {name}. » {n}Cassia incline la tête bien plus bas que ne l'exige le protocole pour un membre de la Navis Nobilite.{/n} « Le palais de l'Atlas contiendra peut-être une récompense qui dépasse notre imagination la plus folle. Ou peut-être n'y trouverons-nous que les cendres grises de la déception... Pourtant, nous avons parcouru beaucoup de chemin ensemble, vous et moi. Je ne peux donc que faire appel à votre magnanimité... une dernière fois. »

languages.text: «Yo... mi casa no tiene nada que ofrecerle, {name}». {n}Cassia inclina la cabeza mucho más de lo que normalmente correspondería a la dignidad de un miembro de la Navis Nobilite.{/n} «Quizá el palacio del Atlas oculte alguna riqueza que sobrepase todas nuestras expectativas. Quizá no descubramos más que las cenizas grises de la decepción. Y pese a todo, hemos recorrido un largo camino {mf|juntos|juntas}. Me rindo ante su magnanimidad... por última vez».
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... mi casa no tiene nada que ofrecerle, {name}». {n}Cassia inclina la cabeza mucho más de lo que normalmente correspondería a la dignidad de un miembro de la Navis Nobilite.{/n} «Quizá el palacio del Atlas oculte alguna riqueza que sobrepase todas nuestras expectativas. Quizá no descubramos más que las cenizas grises de la decepción. Y pese a todo, hemos recorrido un largo camino {mf|juntos|juntas}. Me someto a su magnanimidad... por última vez».

languages.text: "Ich ... Mein Haus hat Euch nichts mehr anzubieten, {name}." {n}Cassia senkt den Kopf sehr viel tiefer, als es die Würde eines Mitglieds der Navis Nobilite üblicherweise gestatten würde.{/n} "Vielleicht enthält der Palast des Atlas eine Belohnung, die all unsere Erwartungen übertrifft. Vielleicht entdecken wir nichts weiter als die graue Asche der Enttäuschung. Und doch haben wir gemeinsam einen langen Weg beschritten, Seite an Seite. Ich unterwerfe mich Eurem Großmut ... zum letzten Mal."
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Mein Haus hat Euch nichts mehr anzubieten, {name}." {n}Cassia senkt den Kopf sehr viel tiefer, als es die Würde eines Mitglieds der Navis Nobilite üblicherweise gestatten würde.{/n} "Vielleicht enthält der Palast des Atlas eine Belohnung, die all unsere Erwartungen übertrifft. Vielleicht entdecken wir nichts weiter als die graue Asche der Enttäuschung. Und doch haben wir gemeinsam einen langen Weg beschritten, Seite an Seite. Ich unterwerfe mich Eurem Großmut ... zum letzten Mal."

languages.text: "Yani... Hanemin sana sunabileceği başka hiçbir şey yok {name}." {n}Cassia, başını Navis Nobilite mensuplarının haysiyetten normalde eğmeyeceği kadar aşağıya eğiyor.{/n} "Belki Atlas Sarayı'nda tüm beklentilerimizin ötesinde bir ödül bizi bekliyordur. Belki de sadece gri kül rengine çalan bir hayal kırıklığı yaşayacağız. Oysa kaç zamandır yan yana, birlikte yürüyoruz. Son bir kez... Yüce gönüllülüğüne muhtacım."
languages.original_text: "I... My House has nothing more to offer you, {name}." {n}Cassia bows her head much lower than what the dignity of one of the Navis Nobilite would normally allow.{/n} "Perhaps the Palace of the Atlas holds a reward that will surpass all our expectations. Perhaps we will discover nothing more than the grey ash of disappointment. And yet, we have walked a long road together, side by side. I surrender myself to your magnanimity... for the last time."

traits.locale_text: "Yani... Hanemin sana sunabileceği başka hiçbir şey yok {name}." {n}Cassia, başını Navis Nobilite üyelerinin haysiyetten normalde eğmeyeceği kadar alçak eğiyor.{/n} "Belki Atlas Sarayı'nda tüm beklentilerimizin ötesinde bir ödül bizi bekliyordur. Belki de sadece gri kül rengine çalan bir hayal kırıklığı keşfedeceğiz. Oysa kaç zamandır yan yana, birlikte yürüyoruz. Son bir kez... Yüce gönüllülüğüne muhtacım."
